name: ZombieStation
description:
Zombies everywhere!

Soldier this is Cpt Morrisson speaking. You must get all virus samples and bring them to us to create a vaccin.

The chopper for evacuation will wait for you at the old Hotel.  But first go to the little mall, and then through the streets of FoxCity.

Good luck soldier, you'll need it.

Cpt Morrisson out!
